text.daily_rewards.daily_rewards.title: Rewards (%1$s)
text.daily_rewards.special_rewards.title: Special Rewards (%1$s)
text.daily_rewards.rewarded_item_empty: Reward Item is empty, please check the logs and the configuration!
text.daily_rewards.rewarded_item: Congratulation %1$s you got %2$s as regonization for %3$s day(s) in this world for this month.
text.daily_rewards.unclaimed_rewarded_it: %1$s you have unclaimed daily rewards, please make sure to claim them in the next %2$s days!
%1$s you have unclaimed daily rewards, please make sure to claim them today!!!
text.daily_rewards.unclaimed_special_rew: %1$s you have unclaimed daily special rewards, please make sure to claim them in the next %2$s days!
%1$s you have unclaimed daily special rewards, please make sure to claim them today!!!
text.daily_rewards.empty_reward.descript: There is no daily rewards for this day for this month.
text.daily_rewards.hidden_reward.descrip: This reward is hidden, you can't claim it until you unlock it.
text.daily_rewards.lock_day.description: This day is locked, you can't claim your daily rewards for this day for this month.
text.daily_rewards.skip_day.description: This day is skipped, you can't claim your daily rewards for this day for this month.
text.daily_rewards.skipped_day.descripti: This day was skipped, a small step to claim your next daily rewards for this month.
text.daily_rewards.taken_reward.descript: You have already taken your daily rewards for this day for this month.
text.daily_rewards.unlock_day.descriptio: This day was unlocked, a small step to claim your next daily rewards for this month.
text.daily_rewards.claim_today.info: ✔ You can claim this reward today.
text.daily_rewards.claimable_in_days.inf: ℹ You can claim this reward in about %1$s days!
text.daily_rewards.lock_today.info: ✔ This day can be unlocked today.
text.daily_rewards.not_claimable_for_thi: ❌ You can't claim this reward for this month, please wait for the next month.
text.daily_rewards.skip_today.info: ✔ This day can be skipped today.
